name: DeepSparks Co., Ltd.
description: Developer of an AI technology platform designed to assist with marketing and alternative scoring applications. The company's platform is a fully digitalized process of lowering risk in credit scoring in the loan approval process by analyzing data, enabling financial institutions and microlenders to serve customers in the underbanked sector.
one_liner: Developer of an AI technology platform designed to assist with marketing and alternative scoring applications. The company's platform is a fully digitalized process of lowering risk in credit scoring in the loan approval process by analyzing data, enabling financial institutions and microlenders to serve customers in the underbanked sector.
